GV05brup___u:1: sūryaś cakṣur vātaḥ prāṇo vyāttam agnir vaiśvānaraḥ saṃvatsara ātmāśvasya medhyasya /
GV05brup___u:2_0: dyauḥ pṛṣṭham antarikṣam udaraṃ pṛthivī pājasyaṃ diśaḥ pārśve avāntaradiśaḥ parśava
GV05brup___u:2_1: ṛtavo 'ṅgāni māsāś cārdhamāsāś ca parvāṇy ahorātrāṇi pratiṣṭhā nakṣatrāṇy asthīni nabho māṃsāni /
GV05brup___u:3: ūvadhyaṃ sikatāḥ sindhavo gudā yakṛc ca klomānaś ca parvatā oṣadhayaś ca vanaspatayaś ca lomāni /
GV05brup___u:13: etau vā aśvaṃ mahimānāv abhitaḥ sambabhūvatuḥ /
GV05brup___u:14: hayo bhūtvā devān avahad vājī gandharvān arvāsurān aśvo manuṣyān /
GV05brup___u:15: samudra evāsya bandhuḥ samudro yoniḥ // BrhUp_1,1.2 //
GV05brup___u:22: arcate vai me kam abhūd iti /
GV05brup___u:24: kaṃ ha vā asmai bhavati ya evam etad arkyasyārkatvaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,2.1 //
GV05brup___u:26: tad yad apāṃ śara āsīt tat samahanyata /
GV05brup___u:29: tasya śrāntasya taptasya tejoraso niravartatāgniḥ // BrhUp_1,2.2 //
GV05brup___u:30: sa tredhātmānaṃ vyakurutādityaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vāyuṃ tṛtīyam /
GV05brup___u:32: tasya prācī dik śiro 'sau cāsau cermau /
GV05brup___u:33: athāsya pratīcī dik puccham asau cāsau ca sakthyau /
GV05brup___u:35: dyauḥ pṛṣṭham antarikṣam udaram iyam uraḥ /
GV05brup___u:37: yatra kva caiti tad eva pratitiṣṭhaty evaṃ vidvān // BrhUp_1,2.3 //
GV05brup___u:39: sa manasā vācaṃ mithunaṃ samabhavad aśanāyā mṛtyuḥ /
GV05brup___u:40: tad yad reta āsīt sa saṃvatsaro 'bhavat /
GV05brup___u:41: na ha purā tataḥ saṃvatsara āsa /
GV05brup___u:42: tam etāvantaṃ kālam abibhar yāvānt saṃvatsaraḥ /
GV05brup___u:47: sa aikṣata yadi vā imam abhimaṃsye kanīyo 'nnaṃ kariṣya iti /
GV05brup___u:48: sa tayā vācā tenātmanedaṃ sarvam asṛjata yad idaṃ kiñca -- ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni chandāṃsi yajñān prajāṃ paśūn /
GV05brup___u:49: sa yad-yad evāsṛjata tattad attum adhriyata /
GV05brup___u:50: sarvaṃ vā attīti tad aditer adititvam /
GV05brup___u:51: sarvasyāttā bhavati sarvam asyānnaṃ bhavati ya evam etad aditer adititvaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,2.5 //
GV05brup___u:55: tasya śrāntasya taptasya yaśo vīryam udakrāmat /
GV05brup___u:58: tasya śarīra eva mana āsīt // BrhUp_1,2.6 //
GV05brup___u:59: so 'kāmayata -- medhyaṃ ma idaṃ syād ātmanvy anena syām iti /
GV05brup___u:61: yad aśvat tan medhyam abhūd iti tad evāśvamedhasyāśvamedhatvam /
GV05brup___u:62: eṣa ha vā aśvamedhaṃ veda ya enam evaṃ veda /
GV05brup___u:67: eṣa vā aśvamedho ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brup___u:72: so punar ekaiva devatā bhavati mṛtyur eva /
GV05brup___u:78: dvayā ha prājāpatyā devāś cāsurāś ca tataḥ kānīyasā eva devā jyāyasā asurāḥ /
GV05brup___u:80: te ha devā ūcur hantāsurān yajña udgīthenātyayāmeti // BrhUp_1,3.1 //
GV05brup___u:81: te ha vācam ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GV05brup___u:83: yo vāci bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat /
GV05brup___u:87: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā yad evedam apratirūpaṃ vadati /
GV05brup___u:89: atha ha prāṇam ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GV05brup___u:91: yaḥ prāṇe bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat /
GV05brup___u:95: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā yad evedam apratirūpaṃ jighrati /
GV05brup___u:97: atha ha cakṣur ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GV05brup___u:99: yaś cakṣuṣi bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat /
GV05brup___u:103: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā yad evedam apratirūpaṃ paśyati /
GV05brup___u:105: atha ha śrotram ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GV05brup___u:107: yaḥ śrotre bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat /
GV05brup___u:114: atha ha mana ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GV05brup___u:116: yo manasi bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat /
GV05brup___u:123: evam u khalv etā devatāḥ pāpmabhir upāsṛjan /
GV05brup___u:125: atha hemam āsanyaṃ prāṇam ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GV05brup___u:129: sa yathāśmānam ṛtvā loṣṭo vidhvaṃsetaivaṃ haiva vidhvaṃsamānā viṣvañco vineśuḥ /
GV05brup___u:132: parāsya dviṣan bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,3.7 //
GV05brup___u:133: te hocuḥ -- kva nu so 'bhūd yo na ittham asakteti /
GV05brup___u:136: sā vā eṣā devatā dūr nāma /
GV05brup___u:138: dūraṃ ha vā asmān mṛtyur bhavati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,3.9 //
GV05brup___u:139: sā vā eṣā devataitāsāṃ devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum apahatya yatrāsāṃ diśām antas tad gamayāṃ cakāra /
GV05brup___u:141: tasmān na janam iyān nāntam iyān net pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum anvavāyānīti // BrhUp_1,3.10 //
GV05brup___u:142: sā vā eṣā devataitāsāṃ devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum apahatyāthainā mṛtyum atyavahat // BrhUp_1,3.11 //
GV05brup___u:143: sā vai vācam eva prathamām atyavahat /
GV05brup___u:144: sā yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata so 'gnir abhavat /
GV05brup___u:145: so 'yam agniḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrānto dīpyate // BrhUp_1,3.12 //
GV05brup___u:147: sa yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa vāyur abhavat /
GV05brup___u:148: so 'yaṃ vāyuḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntaḥ pavate // BrhUp_1,3.13 //
GV05brup___u:150: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa ādityo 'bhavat /
GV05brup___u:151: so 'sāv ādityaḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntas tapati // BrhUp_1,3.14 //
GV05brup___u:153: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata tā diśo 'bhavan /
GV05brup___u:154: tā imā diśaḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntāḥ // BrhUp_1,3.15 //
GV05brup___u:156: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa candramā abhavat /
GV05brup___u:157: so 'sau candraḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrānto bhāti /
GV05brup___u:158: evaṃ ha vā enam eṣā devatā mṛtyum ativahati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,3.16 //
GV05brup___u:160: yad dhi kiñcānnam adyate 'nenaiva tad adyate /
GV05brup___u:163: etāvad vā idaṃ sarvaṃ yad annam /
GV05brup___u:168: tasmād yad anenānnam atti tenaitās tṛpyanti /
GV05brup___u:169: evaṃ ha vā enaṃ svā abhisaṃviśanti bhartā svānāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ puraetā bhavaty annādo 'dhipatir ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brup___u:170: ya u haivaṃvidaṃ sveṣu pratir bubhūṣati na haivālaṃ bhāryebhyo bhavati /
GV05brup___u:171: atha ya evaitam anubhavati yo vaitam anu bhāryān bubhūrṣati sa haivālaṃ bhāryebhyo bhavati // BrhUp_1,3.18 //
GV05brup___u:175: tasmād yasmāt kasmāccāṅgāt prāṇa utkrāmati tad eva tac chuṣyati /
GV05brup___u:176: eṣa hi vā aṅgānāṃ rasaḥ // BrhUp_1,3.19 //
GV05brup___u:179: tasyā eṣa patis tasmād u bṛhaspatiḥ // BrhUp_1,3.20 //
GV05brup___u:182: tasyā eṣa patis tasmād u brahmaṇaspatiḥ // BrhUp_1,3.21 //
GV05brup___u:184: vāg vai sāmaiṣa sā cāmaś ceti tat sāmnaḥ sāmatvam /
GV05brup___u:185: yad v eva samaḥ pluṣiṇā samo maśakena samo nāgena sama ebhis tribhir lokaiḥ samo 'nena sarveṇa tasmād v eva sāma /
GV05brup___u:187: ya evam etat sāma veda // BrhUp_1,3.22 //
GV05brup___u:189: prāṇo vā ut prāṇena hīdaṃ sarvam uttabdham /
GV05brup___u:193: tad dhāpi brahmadattaś caikitāneyo rājānaṃ bhakṣayann uvāca /
GV05brup___u:194: ayaṃ tyasya rājā mūrdhānaṃ vipātayatād yad ito 'yāsya āṅgiraso 'nyenodagāyad iti /
GV05brup___u:195: vācā ca hy eva sa prāṇena codagāyad iti // BrhUp_1,3.24 //
GV05brup___u:196: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ svaṃ veda bhavati hāsya svam /
GV05brup___u:198: tasmād ārtvijyaṃ kariṣyan vāci svaram iccheta /
GV05brup___u:202: bhavati hāsya svaṃ ya evam etat sāmnaḥ svaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,3.25 //
GV05brup___u:203: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ suvarṇaṃ veda bhavati hāsya suvarṇam /
GV05brup___u:205: bhavati hāsya suvarṇaṃ ya evam etat sāmnaḥ suvarṇaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,3.26 //
GV05brup___u:206: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ veda prati ha tiṣṭhati /
GV05brup___u:208: vāci hi khalv eṣa etat prāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhito gīyate /
GV05brup___u:209: anna ity u haika āhuḥ // BrhUp_1,3.27 //
GV05brup___u:211: sa vai khalu prastotā sāma prastauti /
GV05brup___u:212: sa yatra prastuyāt tad etāni japet /
GV05brup___u:216: sa yad āhāsato mā sad gamayeti /
GV05brup___u:217: mṛtyur vā asat sad amṛtaṃ mṛtyor māmṛtaṃ gamayāmṛtaṃ mā kurv ity evaitad āha /
GV05brup___u:219: mṛtyur vai tamo jyotir amṛtaṃ mṛtyor māmṛtaṃ gamayāmṛtaṃ mā kurv ity evaitad āha /
GV05brup___u:222: atha yānītarāṇi stotrāṇi teṣv ātmane 'nnādyam āgāyet /
GV05brup___u:225: sa eṣa evaṃvid udgātātmane vā yajamānāya vā yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam āgāyati /
GV05brup___u:227: na haivālokyatāyā āśāsti ya evam etat sāma veda // BrhUp_1,3.28 //
GV05brup___u:232: tasmād apy etarhy āmantrito 'ham ayam ity evāgra uktvāthānyan nāma prabrūte yad asya bhavati /
GV05brup___u:233: sa yat pūrvo 'smāt sarvasmāt sarvān pāpmana auṣat tasmāt puruṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:234: oṣati ha vai sa taṃ yo 'smāt pūrvo bubhūṣati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,4.1 //
GV05brup___u:237: yan mad anyan nāsti kasmān nu bibhemīti /
GV05brup___u:244: sa haitāvān āsa yathā strīpumāṃsau sampariṣvaktau /
GV05brup___u:247: tasmād idam ardhabṛgalam iva sva iti ha smāha yājñavalkyaḥ /
GV05brup___u:248: tasmād ayam ākāśaḥ striyā pūryata eva /
GV05brup___u:251: so heyam īkṣāṃ cakre -- kathaṃ nu mātmana eva janayitvā sambhavati /
GV05brup___u:264: evam eva yad idaṃ kiñca mithunam ā pipīlikābhyas tat sarvam asṛjata // BrhUp_1,4.4 //
GV05brup___u:265: so 'ved ahaṃ vāva sṛṣṭir asmy ahaṃ hīdaṃ sarvam asṛkṣīti /
GV05brup___u:267: sṛṣṭyāṃ hāsyaitasyāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,4.5 //
GV05brup___u:269: sa mukhāc ca yoner hastābhyāṃ cāgnim asṛjata /
GV05brup___u:272: tad yad idam āhur amuṃ yajāmuṃ yajety ekaikaṃ devam etasyaiva sā visṛṣṭiḥ /
GV05brup___u:273: eṣa u hy eva sarve devāḥ /
GV05brup___u:274: atha yat kiñcedam ārdraṃ tad retaso 'sṛjata /
GV05brup___u:276: etāvad vā idaṃ sarvam annaṃ caivānnādaś ca /
GV05brup___u:279: yac chreyaso devān asṛjatātha yan martyaḥ sann amṛtān asṛjata tasmād atisṛṣṭir /
GV05brup___u:280: atisṛṣṭyāṃ hāsyaitasyāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,4.6 //
GV05brup___u:282: tan nāmarūpābhyām eva vyākriyatāsau nāmāyam idaṃrūpa iti /
GV05brup___u:283: tad idam apy etarhi nāmarūpābhyām eva vyākriyata asau nāmāyam idaṃrūpa iti /
GV05brup___u:284: sa eṣa iha praviṣṭa ā nakhāgrebhyo yathā kṣuraḥ kṣuradhāne 'vahitaḥ syād viśvambharo vā viśvambharakulāye /
GV05brup___u:286: akṛtsno hi saḥ prāṇann eva prāṇo nāma bhavati /
GV05brup___u:287: vadan vāk paśyaṃś cakṣuḥ śṛṇvañ chrotraṃ manvāno manaḥ /
GV05brup___u:289: sa yo 'ta ekaikam upāste na sa veda /
GV05brup___u:292: atra hy ete sarva ekaṃ bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:293: tad etat padanīyam asya sarvasya yad ayam ātmā /
GV05brup___u:295: yathā ha vai padenānuvinded evaṃ kīrtiṃ ślokaṃ vindate ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,4.7 //
GV05brup___u:296: tad etat preyaḥ putrāt preyo vittāt preyo 'nyasmāt sarvasmād antarataraṃ yad ayam ātmā /
GV05brup___u:297: sa yo 'nyam ātmanaḥ priyaṃ bruvāṇaṃ brūyāt priyaṃ rotsyatītīśvaro ha tathaiva syāt /
GV05brup___u:299: sa ya ātmānam eva priyam upāste na hāsya priyaṃ pramāyukaṃ bhavati // BrhUp_1,4.8 //
GV05brup___u:300: tad āhur yad brahmavidyayā sarvaṃ bhaviṣyanto manuṣyā manyante /
GV05brup___u:301: kim u tad brahmāved yasmāt tat sarvam abhavad iti // BrhUp_1,4.9 //
GV05brup___u:306: tad yo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tad abhavat /
GV05brup___u:309: tad dhaitat paśyann ṛṣir vāmadevaḥ pratipede 'haṃ manur abhavaṃ sūryaś ceti /
GV05brup___u:310: tad idam apy etarhi ya evaṃ vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:311: tasya ha na devāś canābhūtyā īśate /
GV05brup___u:313: atha yo 'nyāṃ devatām upāste 'nyo 'sāv anyo 'ham asmīti na sa veda /
GV05brup___u:315: yathā ha vai bahavaḥ paśavo manuṣyaṃ bhuñjyur evam ekaikaḥ puruṣo devān bhunakti /
GV05brup___u:316: ekasminn eva paśāv ādīyamāne 'priyaṃ bhavati kim u bahuṣu /
GV05brup___u:317: tasmād eṣāṃ tan na priyaṃ yad etan manuṣyā vidyuḥ // BrhUp_1,4.10 //
GV05brup___u:318: brahma vā idam agra āsīd ekam eva /
GV05brup___u:321: yāny etāni devatrā kṣatrāṇīndro varuṇaḥ somo rudraḥ parjanyo yamo mṛtyur īśāna iti /
GV05brup___u:323: tasmād brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaṃ adhastād upāste rājasūye /
GV05brup___u:326: tasmād yady api rājā paramatāṃ gacchati brahmaivāntata upaniśrayati svāṃ yonim /
GV05brup___u:327: ya u enaṃ hinasti svāṃ sa yonim ṛcchati /
GV05brup___u:328: sa pāpīyān bhavati yathā śreyāṃsaṃ hiṃsitvā // BrhUp_1,4.11 //
GV05brup___u:331: yāny etāni devajātāni gaṇaśa ākhyāyante vasavo rudrā ādityā viśve devā maruta iti // BrhUp_1,4.12 //
GV05brup___u:335: iyaṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ puṣyati yad idaṃ kiñca // BrhUp_1,4.13 //
GV05brup___u:338: tad etat kṣatrasya kṣatraṃ yad dharmaḥ /
GV05brup___u:342: yo vai sa dharmaḥ satyaṃ vai tat /
GV05brup___u:343: tasmāt satyaṃ vadantam āhur dharmaṃ vadatīti /
GV05brup___u:345: etad dhy evaitad ubhayaṃ bhavati // BrhUp_1,4.14 //
GV05brup___u:346: tad etad brahma kṣatraṃ viṭ śūdraḥ /
GV05brup___u:347: tad agninaiva deveṣu brahmābhavad brāhmaṇo manuṣyeṣu,
GV05brup___u:351: tasmād agnāv eva deveṣu lokam icchante brāhmaṇe manuṣyeṣu /
GV05brup___u:353: atha yo ha vā asmāl lokāt svaṃ lokam adṛṣṭvā praiti sa enam avidito na bhunakti yathā vedo vānanūkto 'nyad vā karmākṛtam /
GV05brup___u:354: yadi ha vā apy anevaṃvin mahatpuṇyaṃ karma karoti tad dhāsyāntataḥ kṣīyata eva /
GV05brup___u:356: sa ya ātmānam eva lokam upāste na hāsya karma kṣīyate /
GV05brup___u:357: asmād dhy evātmano yadyat kāmayate tattat sṛjate // BrhUp_1,4.15 //
GV05brup___u:358: atho ayaṃ vā ātmā sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ lokaḥ /
GV05brup___u:359: sa yaj juhoti yad yajate tena devānāṃ lokaḥ /
GV05brup___u:361: atha yat pitṛbhyo nipṛṇāti yat prajām icchate tena pitṝṇām /
GV05brup___u:362: atha yan manuṣyān vāsayate yad ebhyo 'śanaṃ dadāti tena manuṣyāṇām /
GV05brup___u:363: atha yat paśubhyas tṛṇodakaṃ vindati tena paśūnām /
GV05brup___u:364: yad asya gṛheṣu śvāpadā vayāṃsy ā pipīlikābhya upajīvanti tena teṣāṃ lokaḥ /
GV05brup___u:365: yathā ha vai svāya lokāyāriṣṭim icchet /
GV05brup___u:366: evaṃ haivaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāny ariṣṭim icchanti /
GV05brup___u:367: tad vā etad viditaṃ mīmāṃsitam // BrhUp_1,4.16 //
GV05brup___u:369: so 'kāmayata jāyā me syād atha prajāyeya /
GV05brup___u:370: atha vittaṃ me syād atha karma kurvīyeti /
GV05brup___u:373: tasmād apy etarhy ekākī kāmayate -- jāyā me syād atha prajāyeyātha vittaṃ me syād atha karma kurvīyeti /
GV05brup___u:374: sa yāvad apy eteṣām ekaikaṃ na prāpnoty akṛtsna eva tāvan manyate /
GV05brup___u:388: pāṅktam idaṃ sarvaṃ yad idaṃ kiñca /
GV05brup___u:389: tad idaṃ sarvam āpnoti ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,4.17 //
GV05brup___u:391: ekam asya sādhāraṇaṃ dve devān abhājayat /
GV05brup___u:393: tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca na /
GV05brup___u:394: kasmāt tāni na kṣīyante adyamānāni sarvadā /
GV05brup___u:395: yo vai tām akṣitiṃ veda so 'nnam atti pratīkena /
GV05brup___u:396: sa devān apigacchati sa ūṛjam upajīvati /
GV05brup___u:399: medhayā hi tapasājanayat pitaikam asya sādhāraṇam iti /
GV05brup___u:400: idam evāsya tat sādhāraṇam annaṃ yad idam adyate /
GV05brup___u:401: sa ya etad upāste na sa pāpmano vyāvartate /
GV05brup___u:405: tasmād devebhyo juhvati ca pra ca juhvati /
GV05brup___u:410: payo hy evāgre manuṣyāś ca paśavaś copajīvanti /
GV05brup___u:411: tasmāt kumāraṃ jātaṃ ghṛtaṃ vaivāgre pratilehayanti stanaṃ vānudhāpayanti /
GV05brup___u:412: atha vatsaṃ jātam āhus tṛṇād iti /
GV05brup___u:413: tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca neti /
GV05brup___u:414: payasi hīdaṃ sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca na /
GV05brup___u:415: tad yad idam āhuḥ saṃvatsaraṃ payasā juhvad apa punarmṛtyuṃ jayatīti /
GV05brup___u:417: yad ahar eva juhoti tad ahaḥ punarmṛtyum apajayaty evaṃ vidvān /
GV05brup___u:419: kasmāt tāni na kṣīyante adyamānāni sarvadeti /
GV05brup___u:421: sa hīdam annaṃ punaḥ punar janayate /
GV05brup___u:424: sa hīdam annaṃ dhiyādhiyā janayate karmabhiḥ /
GV05brup___u:425: yad dhaitan na kuryāt kṣīyeta ha /
GV05brup___u:428: sa devān apigacchati sa ūrjam upajīvatīti praśaṃsā // BrhUp_1,5.2 //
GV05brup___u:431: anyatramanā abhūvaṃ nādarśam anyatramanā abhūvaṃ nāśrauṣam iti manasā hy eva paśyati manasā śṛṇoti /
GV05brup___u:432: kāmaḥ saṃkalpo vicikitsā śraddhāśraddhā dhṛtir adhṛtir hrīr dhīr bhīr ity etat sarvaṃ mana eva /
GV05brup___u:433: tasmād api pṛṣṭhata upaspṛṣṭo manasā vijānāti /
GV05brup___u:434: yaḥ kaśca śabdo vāg eva sā /
GV05brup___u:435: eṣā hy antaṃ āyattaiṣā hi na /
GV05brup___u:436: prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samāno 'na ity etat sarvaṃ prāṇa eva /
GV05brup___u:440: vāg evāyaṃ loko mano 'ntarikṣalokaḥ prāṇo 'sau lokaḥ // BrhUp_1,5.4 //
GV05brup___u:442: vāg evargvedo mano yajurvedaḥ prāṇaḥ sāmavedaḥ // BrhUp_1,5.5 //
GV05brup___u:447: mana eva pitā vāṅ mātā prāṇaḥ prajā // BrhUp_1,5.7 //
GV05brup___u:449: yat kiñca vijñātaṃ vācas tad rūpam /
GV05brup___u:452: yat kiñca vijijñāsyaṃ manasas tad rūpam /
GV05brup___u:460: tad yāvaty eva vāk tāvatī pṛthivī tāvān ayam agniḥ // BrhUp_1,5.11 //
GV05brup___u:463: tad yāvad eva manas tāvatī dyaus tāvān asāv ādityaḥ /
GV05brup___u:469: nāsya sapatno bhavati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_1,5.12 //
GV05brup___u:472: tad yāvān eva prāṇas tāvatya āpas tāvān asau candraḥ /
GV05brup___u:473: ta ete sarva eva samāḥ sarve 'nantāḥ /
GV05brup___u:474: sa yo haitān antavata upāste 'ntavantaṃ sa lokaṃ jayati /
GV05brup___u:475: atha yo haitān anantān upāste 'nantaṃ sa lokaṃ jayati // BrhUp_1,5.13 //
GV05brup___u:479: sa rātribhir evā ca pūryate 'pa ca kṣīyate /
GV05brup___u:480: so 'māvāsyāṃ rātrim etayā ṣoḍaśyā kalayā sarvam idaṃ prāṇabhṛd anupraviśya tataḥ prātar jāyate /
GV05brup___u:481: tasmād etāṃ rātriṃ prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇaṃ na vicchindyād api kṛkalāsasyaitasyā eva devatāyā apacityai // BrhUp_1,5.14 //
GV05brup___u:482: yo vai sa saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ ṣoḍaśakālo 'yam eva sa yo 'yam evaṃvit puruṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:485: sa vittenaivā ca pūryate 'pa ca kṣīyate /
GV05brup___u:486: tad etan nabhyaṃ yad ayam ātmā /
GV05brup___u:488: tasmād yady api sarvajyāniṃ jīyata ātmanā cej jīvati pradhināgād ity evāhuḥ // BrhUp_1,5.15 //
GV05brup___u:489: atha trayo vāva lokā manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko devaloka iti /
GV05brup___u:490: so 'yaṃ manuṣyalokaḥ putreṇaiva jayyo nānyena karmaṇā /
GV05brup___u:496: yadā praiṣyan manyate 'tha putram āha -- tvaṃ brahma tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ loka iti /
GV05brup___u:497: sa putraḥ pratyāhāhaṃ brahmāhaṃ yajño 'ham loka iti /
GV05brup___u:498: yad vai kiñcānūktaṃ tasya sarvasya brahmety ekatā /
GV05brup___u:499: ye vai ke ca yajñās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ yajña ity ekatā /
GV05brup___u:500: ye vai ke ca lokās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ loka ity ekatā /
GV05brup___u:502: etan mā sarvaṃ sann ayam ito bhunajad iti /
GV05brup___u:505: sa yadaivaṃvid asmāl lokāt praity athaibhir eva prāṇaiḥ saha putram āviśati /
GV05brup___u:506: sa yady anena kiñcid akṣṇayā kṛtaṃ bhavati tasmād enaṃ sarvasmāt putro muñcati tasmāt putro nāma /
GV05brup___u:508: athainam ete devāḥ prāṇā amṛtā āviśanti // BrhUp_1,5.17 //
GV05brup___u:509: pṛthivyai cainam agneś ca daivī vāg āviśati /
GV05brup___u:510: sā vai daivī vāg yayā yad yad eva vadati tat tad bhavati // BrhUp_1,5.18 //
GV05brup___u:511: divaś cainam ādityāc ca daivaṃ mana āviśati /
GV05brup___u:512: tad vai daivaṃ mano yenānandy eva bhavaty atho na śocati // BrhUp_1,5.19 //
GV05brup___u:513: adbhyaś cainaṃ candramasaś ca daivaḥ prāṇa āviśati /
GV05brup___u:514: sa vai daivaḥ prāṇo yaḥ saṃcaraṃś cāsaṃcaraṃś ca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati /
GV05brup___u:515: sa eṣa evaṃvit sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātmā bhavati /
GV05brup___u:517: yathaitāṃ devatāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny avanty evaṃ haivaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny avanti /
GV05brup___u:518: yad u kiñcemāḥ prajāḥ śocanty amaivāsāṃ tad bhavati /
GV05brup___u:520: na ha vai devān pāpaṃ gacchati // BrhUp_1,5.20 //
GV05brup___u:534: athemam eva nāpnot yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ /
GV05brup___u:536: ayaṃ vai naḥ śreṣṭho yaḥ saṃcaraṃś cāsaṃcaraṃś ca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati /
GV05brup___u:540: tena ha vāva tat kulam ācakṣate yasmin kule bhavati ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brup___u:542: anuśuṣya haivāntato mriyata ity adhyātmam // BrhUp_1,5.21 //
GV05brup___u:548: sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇa evam etāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyuḥ /
GV05brup___u:549: mlocanti hy anyā devatā na vāyuḥ /
GV05brup___u:552: yataś codeti sūryo 'staṃ yatra ca gacchatīti /
GV05brup___u:553: prāṇād vā eṣa udeti prāṇe 'stam eti /
GV05brup___u:554: taṃ devāś cakrire dharmaṃ sa evādya sa u śva iti /
GV05brup___u:555: yad vā ete 'murhy adhriyanta tad evāpy adya kurvanti /
GV05brup___u:556: tasmād ekam eva vrataṃ caret prāṇyāc caivāpānyāc ca /
GV05brup___u:557: nen mā pāpmā mṛtyur āpnavad iti /
GV05brup___u:558: yady u caret samāpipayiṣet teno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati // BrhUp_1,5.23 //
GV05brup___u:559: trayaṃ vā idaṃ nāma rūpaṃ karma /
GV05brup___u:560: teṣāṃ nāmnāṃ vāg ity etad eṣām uktham /
GV05brup___u:565: etad dhi sarvāṇi nāmāni bibharti // BrhUp_1,6.1 //
GV05brup___u:566: atha rūpāṇāṃ cakṣur ity etad eṣām uktham /
GV05brup___u:571: etad dhi sarvāṇi rūpāṇi bibharti // BrhUp_1,6.2 //
GV05brup___u:572: atha karmaṇām ātmety etad eṣām uktham /
GV05brup___u:578: tad etat trayaṃ sad ekam ayam ātmā /
GV05brup___u:585: sa hovācājātaśatruṃ kāśyaṃ -- brahma te bravāṇīti /
GV05brup___u:586: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- sahasram etasyāṃ vāci dadmaḥ,
GV05brup___u:587: janako janaka iti vai janā dhāvantīti // BrhUp_2,1.1 //
GV05brup___u:588: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāsāv āditye puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:590: atiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ mūrdhā rājeti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:591: sa ya etam evam upāste 'tiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ mūrdhā rājā bhavati // BrhUp_2,1.2 //
GV05brup___u:592: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāsau candre puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:594: bṛhan pāṇdaravāsāḥ somo rājeti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:595: sa ya etam evam upāste 'har-ahar sutaḥ prasuto bhavati /
GV05brup___u:597: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāsau vidyuti puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:599: tejasvīti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:600: sa ya etam evam upāste tejasvī ha bhavati /
GV05brup___u:602: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam ākāśe puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:604: pūrṇam apravartīti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:605: sa ya etam evam upāste pūryate prajayā paśubhir nāsyāsmāl lokāt prajodvartate // BrhUp_2,1.5 //
GV05brup___u:606: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ vāyau puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:608: indro vaikuṇṭho 'parājitā seneti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:609: sa ya etam evam upāste jiṣṇur hāparājiṣṇur bhavaty anyatastyajāyī // BrhUp_2,1.6 //
GV05brup___u:610: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam agnau puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:612: viṣāsahir iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:613: sa ya etam evam upāste viṣāsahir ha bhavati /
GV05brup___u:615: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam apsu puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:617: pratirūpa iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:618: sa ya etam evam upāste pratirūpaṃ haivainam upagacchati nāpratirūpam /
GV05brup___u:620: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam ādarśe puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:622: rociṣṇur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:623: sa ya etam evam upāste rociṣṇur ha bhavati /
GV05brup___u:627: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ yantaṃ paścāc chabbo 'nūdety etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:629: asur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:630: sa ya etam evam upāste sarvaṃ haivāsmiṃl loka āyur eti /
GV05brup___u:631: nainaṃ purā kālāt prāṇo jahāti // BrhUp_2,1.10 //
GV05brup___u:632: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ dikṣu puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:634: dvitīyo 'napaga iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:635: sa ya etam evam upāste dvitīyavān ha bhavati /
GV05brup___u:637: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ chāyāmayaḥ puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:639: mṛtyur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:640: sa ya etam evam upāste sarvaṃ haivāsmiṃl loka āyur eti /
GV05brup___u:641: nainaṃ purā kālān mṛtyur āgacchati // BrhUp_2,1.12 //
GV05brup___u:642: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam ātmani puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:644: ātmanvīti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:645: sa ya etam evam upāsta ātmanvī ha bhavati /
GV05brup___u:647: sa ha tūṣṇīm āsa gārgyaḥ // BrhUp_2,1.13 //
GV05brup___u:651: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- upa tvāyānīti // BrhUp_2,1.14 //
GV05brup___u:652: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- pratilomaṃ caitad yad brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyam upeyād brahma me vakṣyatīti /
GV05brup___u:656: tam etair nāmabhir āmantrayāṃ cakre bṛhan pāṇdaravāsaḥ soma rājann iti /
GV05brup___u:660: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- yatraiṣa etat supto 'bhūd ya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ puruṣaḥ kvaiṣa tadābhūt kuta etad āgād iti /
GV05brup___u:661: tad u ha na mene gārgyaḥ // BrhUp_2,1.16 //
GV05brup___u:662: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- yatraiṣa etat supto 'bhūd ya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ puruṣas tad eṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijnānam ādāya ya eṣo 'ntar hṛdaya ākāśas tasmiñ chete /
GV05brup___u:670: sa yatraitat svapnyayā carati te hāsya lokāḥ /
GV05brup___u:671: tad uteva mahārājo bhavaty uteva mahābrāhmaṇaḥ /
GV05brup___u:673: sa yathā mahārājo jānapadān gṛhītvā sve janapade yathākāmaṃ parivartetaivam evaiṣa etat prāṇān gṛhītvā sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartate // BrhUp_2,1.18 //
GV05brup___u:676: hitā nāma nādyo dvāsaptatiḥ sahasrāṇi hṛdayāt purītatam abhipratiṣṭhante /
GV05brup___u:678: sa yathā kumāro add. vā mahārājo vā mahābrāhmaṇo vātighnīm ānandasya gatvā śayīta /
GV05brup___u:680: sa yathorṇavābhis tantunoccared yathā agneḥ kṣudrā viṣphuliṅgā vyuccaranty evam evāsmād ātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti /
GV05brup___u:682: prāṇā vai satyaṃ teṣām eṣa satyam // BrhUp_2,1.20 //
GV05brup___u:683: yo ha vai śiśuṃ sādhānaṃ sapratyādhānaṃ sasthūṇaṃ sadāmaṃ veda sapta ha dviṣato bhrātṛvyān avaruṇaddhi /
GV05brup___u:684: ayaṃ vāva śiśur yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ /
GV05brup___u:685: tasyedam evādhānam idaṃ pratyādhānaṃ prāṇaḥ sthūṇānnaṃ dāma // BrhUp_2,2.1 //
GV05brup___u:687: tad yā imā akṣaṃl lohinyo rājayas tābhir enaṃ rudro 'nvāyattaḥ /
GV05brup___u:688: atha yā akṣann āpas tābhiḥ parjanyaḥ /
GV05brup___u:694: nāsyānnaṃ kṣīyate ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_2,2.2 //
GV05brup___u:696: arvāgbilaś camasa ūrdhvabudhnas tasmin yaśo nihitaṃ viśvarūpam /
GV05brup___u:697: tasyāsata ṛṣayaḥ sapta tīre vāg aṣṭamī brahmaṇā saṃvidāneti /
GV05brup___u:699: idaṃ tac charīra eṣa hy arvāgbilaś camasa ūrdhvabudhnaḥ /
GV05brup___u:707: vāg ghy aṣṭamī brahmaṇā saṃvitte // BrhUp_2,2.3 //
GV05brup___u:716: attir ha vai nāmaitad yad autrir iti /
GV05brup___u:718: sarvam asyānnaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_2,2.4 //
GV05brup___u:724: tad etan mūrtaṃ yad anyad vāyoś cāntarikṣāc ca /
GV05brup___u:728: tasyaitasya mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brup___u:735: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso ya eṣa etasmin maṇḍale puruṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:739: idam eva mūrtaṃ yad anyat prāṇāc ca yaś cāyam antar ātmann ākāśaḥ /
GV05brup___u:743: tasyaitasya mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso yac cakṣuḥ /
GV05brup___u:745: athāmūrtaṃ prāṇaś ca yaś cāyam antar ātmann ākāśaḥ /
GV05brup___u:749: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣan puruṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:752: yathā māhārajanaṃ vāso yathā pāṇḍvāvikaṃ yathendragopo yathāgnyarcir yathā puṇḍarīkaṃ yathā sakṛdvidyuttam /
GV05brup___u:753: sakṛdvidyutteva ha vā asya śrīr bhavati ya evaṃ veda /
GV05brup___u:755: na hy etasmād iti nety anyat param asti /
GV05brup___u:759: maitreyīti hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- udyāsyan vā are 'ham asmāt sthānād asmi /
GV05brup___u:761: sā hovāca maitreyī -- yan nu ma iyaṃ bhagoḥ sarvā pṛthivī vittena pūrṇā syāt kathaṃ tenāmṛtā syām iti /
GV05brup___u:763: yathaivopakaraṇavatāṃ jīvitaṃ tathaiva te jīvitaṃ syāt /
GV05brup___u:765: sā hovāca maitreyī -- yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kim ahaṃ tena kuryām /
GV05brup___u:766: yad eva bhagavān veda tad eva me brūhīti // BrhUp_2,4.3 //
GV05brup___u:767: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- priyā batāre naḥ satī priyaṃ bhāṣase /
GV05brup___u:771: sa hovāca -- na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavati /
GV05brup___u:772: na vā are jāyāyai kāmāya jāyā priyā bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya jāyā priyā bhavati /
GV05brup___u:773: na vā are putrāṇāṃ kāmāya putrāḥ priyā bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya putrāḥ priyā bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:774: na vā are vittasya kāmāya vittaṃ priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya vittaṃ priyaṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:775: na vā are brahmaṇaḥ kāmāya brahma priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya brahma priyaṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:776: na vā are kṣatrasya kāmāya kṣatraṃ priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya kṣatraṃ priyaṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:777: na vā are lokānāṃ kāmāya lokāḥ priyā bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya lokāḥ priyā bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:778: na vā are devānāṃ kāmāya devāḥ priyā bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya devāḥ priyā bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:779: na vā are bhūtānāṃ kāmāya bhūtāni priyāṇi bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya bhūtāni priyāṇi bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:780: na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:781: ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyo maitreyi /
GV05brup___u:782: ātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇena matyā vijñānenedaṃ sarvaṃ viditam // BrhUp_2,4.5 //
GV05brup___u:783: brahma taṃ parādād yo 'nyatrātmano brahma veda /

GV05brup___u:1101: yājñavalkyeti hovāca -- yat sākṣād aparokṣād brahma ya ātmā sarvāntaras taṃ me vyācakṣveti /

GV05brup___u:1108: sa hovācoṣastaś cākrāyaṇaḥ -- yathā vai brūyād asau gaur asāv aśva ity evam evaitad vyapadiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:1109: yad eva sākṣād aparokṣād brahma ya ātmā sarvāntaras taṃ me vyācakṣveti /

GV05brup___u:1142: kasmin nu khalv ādityalokā otāś ca protāś ceti /
GV05brup___u:1144: kasmin nu khalu candralokā otāś ca protāś ceti /
GV05brup___u:1146: kasmin nu khalu nakṣatralokā otāś ca protāś ceti /
GV05brup___u:1148: kasmin nu khalu devalokā otāś ca protāś ceti /
GV05brup___u:1150: kasmin nu khalv indralokā otāś ca protāś ceti /
GV05brup___u:1152: kasmin nu khalu prajāpatilokā otāś ca protāś ceti /
GV05brup___u:1154: kasmin nu khalu brahmalokā otāś ca protāś ceti /
GV05brup___u:1159: tato ha gārgī vācaknavy upararāma // BrhUp_3,6.1 //
GV05brup___u:1160: athainam uddālaka āruṇiḥ papraccha -- yājñavalkyeti hovāca /
GV05brup___u:1161: madreṣv avasāma patañcalasya kāpyasya gṛheṣu yajñam adhīyānāḥ /
GV05brup___u:1165: so 'bravīt patañcalaṃ kāpyaṃ yājñikāṃś ca -- vettha nu tvaṃ kāpya tat sūtraṃ yasminn ayaṃ ca lokaḥ paraś ca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavantīti /
GV05brup___u:1166: so 'bravīt patañcalaḥ kāpyo nāhaṃ tad bhagavan vedeti /
GV05brup___u:1168: vettha nu tvaṃ kāpya tam antaryāmiṇaṃ ya imaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāny antaro yamayati /
GV05brup___u:1169: so 'bravīt patañcalaḥ kāpyo nāhaṃ taṃ bhagavan vedeti /
GV05brup___u:1171: yo vai tat kāpya sūtraṃ vidyāt taṃ cāntaryāmiṇam iti sa brahmavit sa lokavit sa devavit sa vedavit sa ātmavit sa sarvavit /
GV05brup___u:1174: tac cet tvaṃ yājñavalkya sūtram avidvāṃs taṃ cāntaryāmiṇaṃ brahmagavīr udajase mūrdhā te vipatiṣyati /
GV05brup___u:1175: veda vā ahaṃ gautama tat sūtraṃ taṃ cāntaryāmiṇam iti /
GV05brup___u:1176: yo vā idaṃ kaśca brūyād veda vedeti yathā vettha tathā brūhīti // BrhUp_3,7.1 //
GV05brup___u:1177: sa hovaca -- vāyur vai gautama tat sūtram /
GV05brup___u:1178: vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāyaṃ ca lokaḥ paraś ca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:1179: tasmād vai gautama puruṣaṃ pretam āhur vyasraṃsiṣatāsyāṅgānīti /
GV05brup___u:1180: vāyunā hi gautama sūtreṇa samdṛbdhāni bhavantīti /
GV05brup___u:1183: yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīm antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.3 //
GV05brup___u:1184: yo 'psu tiṣṭhann adbhyo 'ntaro yam āpo na vidur yasyāpaḥ śarīraṃ yo 'po 'ntaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.4 //
GV05brup___u:1185: yo 'gnau tiṣṭhann agner antaro yam agnir na veda yasyāgniḥ śarīraṃ yo 'gnim antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.5 //
GV05brup___u:1186: yo 'ntarikṣe tiṣṭhann antarikṣād antaro yam antarikṣaṃ na veda yasyāntarikṣaṃ śarīraṃ yo 'ntarikṣam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.6 //
GV05brup___u:1187: yo vāyau tiṣṭhan vāyor antaro yaṃ vāyur na veda yasya vāyuḥ śarīraṃ yo vāyum antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.7 //
GV05brup___u:1188: yo divi tiṣṭhan divo 'ntaro yaṃ dyaur na veda yasya dyauḥ śarīraṃ yo divam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.8 //
GV05brup___u:1189: ya āditye tiṣṭhann ādityād antaro yam ādityo na veda yasyādityaḥ śarīraṃ ya ādityam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.9 //
GV05brup___u:1190: yo dikṣu tiṣṭhan digbhyo 'ntaro yaṃ diśo na vidur yasya diśaḥ śarīraṃ yo diśo 'ntaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.10 //
GV05brup___u:1191: yaś candratārake tiṣṭhañ candratārakād antaro yaṃ candratārakaṃ na veda yasya candratārakaṃ śarīraṃ yaś candratārakam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.11 //
GV05brup___u:1192: ya ākāśe tiṣṭhann ākāśād antaro yam ākāśo na veda yasyākāśaḥ śarīraṃ ya ākāśam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.12 //
GV05brup___u:1193: yas tamasi tiṣṭhaṃs tamaso 'ntaro yaṃ tamo na veda yasya tamaḥ śarīraṃ yas tamo 'ntaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.13 //
GV05brup___u:1194: yas tejasi tiṣṭhaṃs tejaso 'ntaro yaṃ tejo na veda yasya tejaḥ śarīraṃ yas tejo 'ntaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.14 //
GV05brup___u:1196: yaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tiṣṭhan sarvebhyo bhūtebhyo 'ntaro yaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni na vidur yasya sarvāṇi bhutāni śarīraṃ yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāny antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1199: yaḥ prāṇe tiṣṭhan prāṇād antaro yaṃ prāṇo na veda yasya prāṇaḥ śarīraṃ yaḥ prāṇam antaro yamayati eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.16 //
GV05brup___u:1200: yo vāci tiṣṭhan vāco 'ntaro yaṃ vāṅ na veda yasya vāk śarīraṃ yo vācam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.17 //
GV05brup___u:1201: yaś cakṣuṣi tiṣṭhañ cakṣuṣo 'ntaro yaṃ cakṣur na veda yasya cakṣuḥ śarīraṃ yaś cakṣur antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.18 //
GV05brup___u:1202: yaḥ śrotre tiṣṭhañ chrotrād antaro yaṃ śrotraṃ na veda yasya śrotraṃ śarīraṃ yaḥ śrotram antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.19 //
GV05brup___u:1203: yo manasi tiṣṭhan manaso 'ntaro yaṃ mano na veda yasya manaḥ śarīraṃ yo mano 'ntaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.20 //
GV05brup___u:1204: yas tvaci tiṣṭhaṃs tvaco 'ntaro yaṃ tvaṅ na veda yasya tvak śarīraṃ yas tvacam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.21 //
GV05brup___u:1205: yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan vijñānād antaro yaṃ vijñānaṃ na veda yasya vijñānaṃ śarīraṃ yo vijñānam antaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // BrhUp_3,7.22 //
GV05brup___u:1206: yo retasi tiṣṭhaṃ retaso 'ntaro yaṃ reto na veda yasya retaḥ śarīraṃ yo reto 'ntaro yamayaty eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1208: nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā nānyo 'to 'sti śrotā nānyo 'to 'sti mantā nānyo 'to 'sti vijñātā /
GV05brup___u:1212: atha ha vācaknavy uvāca -- brāhmaṇā bhagavanto hantāham imaṃ dvau praśnau prakṣyāmi /
GV05brup___u:1214: na vai jātu yuṣmākam imaṃ kaścid brahmodyaṃ jeteti /
GV05brup___u:1216_0: sā hovāca -- ahaṃ vai tvā yājñavalkya yathā kāśyo vā vaideho vograputra ujjyaṃ dhanur
GV05brup___u:1216_1: adhijyaṃ kṛtvā dvau bāṇavantau sapatnātivyādhinau haste kṛtvopottiṣṭhed evam evāhaṃ
GV05brup___u:1219_0: sā hovāca -- yad ūrdhvaṃ yājñavalkya divo yad avāk pṛthivyā yad antarā dyāvāpṛthivī
GV05brup___u:1219_1: ime yad bhūtaṃ ca bhavac ca bhaviṣyac cety ācakṣate kasmiṃs tad otaṃ ca protaṃ ceti // BrhUp_3,8.3 //
GV05brup___u:1220: sa hovāca -- yad ūrdhvaṃ gārgi divo yad avāk pṛthivyā yad antarā dyāvāpṛthivī ime yad bhūtaṃ ca bhavac ca bhaviṣyac cety ācakṣata ākāśe tad otaṃ ca protaṃ ceti // BrhUp_3,8.4 //
GV05brup___u:1221: sā hovaca -- namas te 'stu yājñavalkya yo ma etaṃ vyavoco 'parasmai dhārayasveti pṛccha gārgīti // BrhUp_3,8.5 //
GV05brup___u:1222_0: sā hovāca -- yad ūrdhvaṃ yājñavalkya divo yad avāk pṛthivyā yad antarā dyāvāpṛthivī
GV05brup___u:1222_1: ime yad bhūtaṃ ca bhavac ca bhaviṣyac cety ācakṣate kasmiṃs tad otaṃ ca protaṃ ceti // BrhUp_3,8.6 //
GV05brup___u:1223: sa hovāca -- yad ūrdhvaṃ gārgi divo yad avāk pṛthivyā yad antarā dyāvāpṛthivī ime yad bhūtaṃ ca bhavac ca bhaviṣyac cety ācakṣata ākāśa eva tad otaṃ ca protaṃ ceti /
GV05brup___u:1224: kasmin nu khalv ākāśa otaś ca protaś ceti // BrhUp_3,8.7 //
GV05brup___u:1225_0: sa hovāca -- etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadanty asthūlam anaṇv ahrasvam
GV05brup___u:1225_1: adīrgham alohitam asneham acchāyam atamo 'vāyv anākāśam asaṅgam arasam agandham acakṣuṣkam
GV05brup___u:1225_2: aśrotram avāg amano 'tejaskam aprāṇam amukham agātram anantaram abāhyam (VAR for agātram: amātram) /
GV05brup___u:1227: na tad aśnāti kaś cana // BrhUp_3,8.8 //
GV05brup___u:1228: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryacandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ /
GV05brup___u:1229: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi dyāvāpṛthivyau vidhṛte tiṣṭhataḥ /
GV05brup___u:1230: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi nimeṣā muhūrtā ahorātrāṇy ardhamāsā māsā ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsarā iti vidhṛtās tiṣṭhanti /
GV05brup___u:1231: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi prācyo 'nyā nadyaḥ syandante śvetebhyaḥ parvatebhyaḥ pratīcyo 'nyā yāṃ yāṃ ca diśam anu /
GV05brup___u:1232: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi manuṣyāḥ praśasanti yajamānaṃ devā darvīṃ pitaro 'nvāyattāḥ //
GV05brup___u:1235: yo vā etad akṣaram gārgy aviditvāsmiṃl loke juhoti yajate tapas tapyate bahūni varṣasahasrāṇy antavad evāsya tad bhavati
GV05brup___u:1236: yo vā etad akṣaram aviditvā gārgy aviditvāsmāl lokāt praiti sa kṛpaṇaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1237: atha ya etad akṣaraṃ gārgi viditvāsmāl lokāt praiti sa brāhmaṇaḥ // BrhUp_3,8.10 //
GV05brup___u:1238: tad vā etad akṣaraṃ gārgy adṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭraśrutaṃ śrotramataṃ mantravijñātaṃ vijñātṛ /
GV05brup___u:1243: etasmin nu khalv akṣare gārgy ākāśa otaś ca protaś ca // BrhUp_3,8.11 //
GV05brup___u:1244: sā hovāca -- brāhmaṇā bhagavantas tad eva bahu manyadhvaṃ yad asmān namaskāreṇa mucyedhvam /
GV05brup___u:1245: na vai jātu yuṣmākam imaṃ kaścid brahmodyaṃ jeteti /
GV05brup___u:1247: atha hainaṃ vidagdhaḥ śākalyaḥ papraccha -- kati devā yājñavalkyeti /
GV05brup___u:1248: sa haitayaiva nividā pratipede yāvanto vaiśvadevasya nividy ucyante /
GV05brup___u:1249: trayaś ca trī ca śatā trayaś ca trī ca sahasreti /
GV05brup___u:1269: katame te trayaś ca trī ca śatā trayaś ca trī ca sahasreti // BrhUp_3,9.1 //
GV05brup___u:1273: aṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityāḥ ta ekatriṃśad aindraś caiva prajāpatiś ca trayastriṃśāv iti // BrhUp_3,9.2 //
GV05brup___u:1275: agniś ca pṛthivī ca vāyuś cāntarikṣaṃ cādityaś ca dyauḥ ca candramāś ca nakṣatrāṇi caite vasavaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1276: eteṣu hīdaṃ sarvaṃ vasu hitaṃ iti tasmād vasava iti // BrhUp_3,9.3 //
GV05brup___u:1279: te yadāsmāc charīrān martyād utkrāmanty atha rodayanti /
GV05brup___u:1280: tad yad rodayanti tasmād rudrā iti // BrhUp_3,9.4 //
GV05brup___u:1284: te yad idaṃ sarvam ādadānā yanti tasmād ādityā iti // BrhUp_3,9.5 //
GV05brup___u:1292: agniś ca pṛthivī ca vāyuś cāntarikṣaś cādityaś ca dyauś caite ṣaṭ /
GV05brup___u:1293: ete hīdaṃ sarvaṃ ṣaḍ iti // BrhUp_3,9.7 //
GV05brup___u:1301: tad āhur yad ayam eka ivaiva pavate /
GV05brup___u:1303: yad asminn idaṃ sarvam adhyārdhnot tenādhyardha iti /
GV05brup___u:1306: sa brahma tyad ity ācakṣate // BrhUp_3,9.9 //
GV05brup___u:1307: pṛthivy eva yasyāyatanam agnir loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1308: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1309: ya evāyaṃ śārīraḥ puruṣaḥ sa eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1312: kāma eva yasyāyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1313: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1314: ya evāyaṃ kāmamayaḥ puruṣaḥ sa eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1317: rūpāṇy eva yasyāyatanaṃ cakṣur loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1318: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1319: ya evāsāv āditye puruṣaḥ sa eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1322: ākaśa eva yasyāyatanaṃ śrotraṃ loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1323: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1324: ya evāyam śrautaḥ prātiśrutkaḥ puruṣaḥ sa eṣa /
GV05brup___u:1327: tama eva yasyāyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1328: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1329: ya evāyaṃ chāyāmayaḥ puruṣaḥ sa eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1332: rūpāṇy eva yasyāyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1333: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1334: ya evāyam ādarśe puruṣaḥ sa eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1337: āpa eva yasyāyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1338: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1339: ya evāyaṃ apsu puruṣaḥ sa eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1342: reta eva yasyāyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ loko mano jyotir yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ vidyāt sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ sa vai veditā syāt /
GV05brup___u:1343: yājñavalkya veda vā ahaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ sarvasyātmanaḥ parāyaṇaṃ yam āttha /
GV05brup___u:1344: ya evāyaṃ putramayaḥ puruṣaḥ sa eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1348: tvāṃ svid ime brāhmaṇā aṅgārāvakṣayaṇam akratā3 iti // BrhUp_3,9.18 //
GV05brup___u:1350: yad idaṃ kurupañcālānāṃ brāhmanān atyavādīḥ kiṃ brahma vidvān iti /
GV05brup___u:1352: yad diśo vettha sadevāḥ sapratiṣṭhāḥ // BrhUp_3,9.19 //
GV05brup___u:1363: hṛdaye hy eva rūpāṇi pratiṣṭhitāni bhavantīti /
GV05brup___u:1373: yadā hy eva śraddhatte 'tha dakṣiṇāṃ dadāti /
GV05brup___u:1378: hṛdaye hy eva śraddhā pratiṣṭhitā bhavatīti /
GV05brup___u:1388: tasmād api pratirūpaṃ jātam āhur hṛdayād iva sṛpto hṛdayād iva nirmita iti /
GV05brup___u:1389: hṛdaye hy eva retaḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ bhavatīti /
GV05brup___u:1397: tasmād api dīkṣitam āhuḥ satyaṃ vadeti /
GV05brup___u:1402: hṛdaye hy eva satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ bhavatīti /
GV05brup___u:1410: kasmin nu hṛdayaṃ pratiṣṭhitam iti // BrhUp_3,9.24 //
GV05brup___u:1413: yad dhy etad anyatrāsmat syāc chvāno vainad adyur vayāṃsi vainad vimathnīrann iti // BrhUp_3,9.25 //
GV05brup___u:1414: kasmin nu tvaṃ cātmā ca pratiṣṭhitau stha iti /
GV05brup___u:1430: etāny aṣṭāv āyatanāny aṣṭau lokā add. aṣṭau devā aṣṭau puruṣāḥ /
GV05brup___u:1431: sa yas tān puruṣān niruhya pratyuhyātyakrāmat taṃ tvaupaniṣadaṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchāmi /
GV05brup___u:1432: taṃ cen me na vivakṣyasi mūrdhā te vipatiṣyatīti /
GV05brup___u:1435: api hāsya parimoṣiṇo 'sthīny apajahrur anyan manyamānāḥ // BrhUp_3,9.26 //
GV05brup___u:1436: atha hovāca -- brāhmaṇā bhagavanto yo vaḥ kāmayate sa mā pṛcchatu /
GV05brup___u:1438: yo vaḥ kāmayate taṃ vaḥ pṛcchāmi sarvān vā vaḥ pṛcchāmīti /
GV05brup___u:1439: te ha brāhmaṇā na dadhṛṣuḥ // BrhUp_3,9.27 //
GV05brup___u:1442: tasya lomāni parṇāni tvag asyotpāṭikā bahiḥ // BrhUp_3,9.28:1 //

GV05brup___u:1445: māṃsāny asya śakarāṇi kināṭaṃ snāva tat sthiram /

GV05brup___u:1447: yad vṛkṣo vṛkṇo rohati mūlān navataraḥ punaḥ /

GV05brup___u:1449: retasa iti mā vocata jīvatas tat prajāyate /

GV05brup___u:1451: yat samūlam āvṛheyur vṛkṣaṃ na punar ābhavet /

GV05brup___u:1460: taṃ hovāca -- yājñavalkya kim artham acārīḥ paśūn icchan aṇvantānīti /
GV05brup___u:1461: ubhayam eva saṃrāḍ iti hovāca // BrhUp_4,1.1 //

GV05brup___u:1474_1: sūtrāṇy anuvyākhyānāni vyākhyānānīṣṭaṃ hutam āśitaṃ pāyitam ayaṃ ca lokaḥ paraś ca

GV05brup___u:1497: api tatra vadhāśaṅkā bhavati yāṃ diśam eti prāṇasyaiva samrāṭ kāmāya /
GV05brup___u:1503: hastyṛṣabhaṃ sahasraṃ dadāmīti hovāca janako vaidehah /
GV05brup___u:1504: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- pitā me 'manyata nānanuśiṣya hareteti // BrhUp_4,1.3 //
GV05brup___u:1505: yad eva te kaścid abravīt tac chṛṇavāmeti /
GV05brup___u:1508: yathā mātṛmān pitṛmān ācāryavān brūyāt tathā tad vārṣṇo 'bravīc cakṣur vai brahmeti /
GV05brup___u:1518: cakṣuṣā vai samrāṭ paśyantam āhur adrākṣīr iti /
GV05brup___u:1519: sa āhādrākṣam iti tat satyaṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:1525: hastyṛṣabhaṃ sahasraṃ dadāmīti hovāca janako vaidehaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1526: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- pitā me 'manyata nānanuśiṣya hareteti // BrhUp_4,1.4 //
GV05brup___u:1527: yad eva te kaścid abravīt tac chṛṇavāmeti /
GV05brup___u:1530: yathā mātṛmān pitṛmān ācāryavān brūyāt tathā tad bhāradvājo 'bravīc chrotraṃ vai brahmeti /
GV05brup___u:1536: śrotram evāyatanam ākāśaḥ pratiṣṭhānantam ity enad upāsīta /
GV05brup___u:1539: tasmād vai samrāḍ api yāṃ kāñca diśaṃ gacchati naivāsyā antaṃ gacchati /
GV05brup___u:1547: hastyṛṣabhaṃ sahasraṃ dadāmīti hovāca janako vaidehaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1548: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- pitā me 'manyata nānanuśiṣya hareteti // BrhUp_4,1.5 //
GV05brup___u:1549: yad eva te kaścid abravīt tac chṛṇavāmeti /
GV05brup___u:1550: abravīn me satyakāmo jābālaḥ -- mano vai brahmeti /
GV05brup___u:1551: yathā mātṛmān pitṛmān ācāryavān brūyāt tathā taj jābālo 'bravīn mano vai brahmeti /
GV05brup___u:1557: mana evāyatanam ākāśaḥ pratiṣṭhānanda ity enad upāsīta /
GV05brup___u:1559: mana eva samrāḍ iti hovāca manasā vai samrāṭ striyam abhi hāryati tasyāṃ pratirūpaḥ putro jāyate /
GV05brup___u:1566: hastyṛṣabhaṃ sahasraṃ dadāmīti hovāca janako vaidehaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1567: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- pitā me 'manyata nānanuśiṣya hareteti // BrhUp_4,1.6 //
GV05brup___u:1568: yad eva te kaścid abravīt tac chṛṇavāmeti /
GV05brup___u:1571: yathā mātṛmān pitṛmān ācāryavān brūyāt tathā tac chākalyo 'bravīd dhṛdayaṃ vai brahmeti /
GV05brup___u:1581: hṛdayaṃ vai samrāṭ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām āyatanam /
GV05brup___u:1582: hṛdayaṃ vai samrāṭ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ pratiṣṭhā /
GV05brup___u:1583: hṛdaye hy eva samrāṭ sarvāṇi bhūtāni pratiṣṭhitāni bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:1589: hastyṛṣabhaṃ sahasraṃ dadāmīti hovāca janako vaidehaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1590: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- pitā me 'manyata nānanuśiṣya hareteti // BrhUp_4,1.7 //
GV05brup___u:1591: janako ha vaidehaḥ kūrcād upāvasarpann uvāca -- namas te 'stu yājñavalkya /
GV05brup___u:1593: sa hovāca yathā vai samrāṇ mahāntam adhvānam eṣyan rathaṃ vā nāvaṃ vā samādadītaivam evaitābhir upaniṣadbhiḥ samāhitātmāsi /
GV05brup___u:1594: evaṃ vṛndāraka āḍhyaḥ sann adhītaveda uktopaniṣatka ito vimucyamānaḥ kva gamiṣyasīti /
GV05brup___u:1595: nāhaṃ tad bhagavan veda yatra gamiṣyāmīti /
GV05brup___u:1596: atha vai te 'haṃ tad vakṣyāmi yatra gamiṣyasīti /
GV05brup___u:1598: indho ha vai nāmaiṣa yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣan puruṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1599: taṃ vā etam indhaṃ santam indra ity ācakṣate parokṣeṇaiva /
GV05brup___u:1600: parokṣapriyā iva hi devāḥ pratyakṣadviṣaḥ // BrhUp_4,2.2 //
GV05brup___u:1601: athaitad vāme 'kṣaṇi puruṣarūpam eṣāsya patnī virāṭ /
GV05brup___u:1602: tayor eṣa saṃstāvo ya eṣo 'ntar hṛdaya ākāśaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1603: athainayor etad annaṃ ya eṣo 'ntar hṛdaye lohitapiṇḍaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1604: athainayor etat prāvaraṇaṃ yad etad antar hṛdaye jālakam iva /
GV05brup___u:1605: athainayor eṣā sṛtiḥ saṃcaraṇī yaiṣā hṛdayād ūrdhvā nāḍy uccarati /
GV05brup___u:1606: yathā keśaḥ sahasradhā bhinna evam asyaitā hitā nāma nāḍyo 'ntar hṛdaye pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:1608: tasmād eṣa praviviktāhāratara iva bhavaty asmāc chārīrād ātmanaḥ // BrhUp_4,2.3 //
GV05brup___u:1622: abhayaṃ vai janaka prāpto 'sīti hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1623: sa hovāca janako vaideho 'bhayaṃ tvā gacchatād yājñavalkya yo no bhagavann abhayaṃ vedayase /
GV05brup___u:1625: ime videhā ayam aham asmīti // BrhUp_4,2.4 //
GV05brup___u:1628: atha ha yaj janakaś ca vaideho yājñavalkyaś cāgnihotre samūdāte /
GV05brup___u:1632: taṃ ha samrāḍ eva pūrvaḥ papraccha // BrhUp_4,3.1 //
GV05brup___u:1635: ādityenaivāyaṃ jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyetīti /
GV05brup___u:1637: astamita āditye yājñavalkya kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brup___u:1639: candramasaivāyaṃ jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyetīti /
GV05brup___u:1641: astamita āditye yājñavalkya candramasy astamite kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brup___u:1643: agninaiva jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyetīti /
GV05brup___u:1645: astamita āditye yājñavalkya candramasy astamite śānte 'gnau kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brup___u:1647: vācaivāyaṃ jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyeti /
GV05brup___u:1648: tasmād vai samrāḍ api yatra svaḥ pāṇir na vinirjñāyate 'tha yatra vāg uccaraty upaiva tatra nyetīti /
GV05brup___u:1650: astamita āditye yājñavalkya candramasy astamite śānte 'gnau śāntāyāṃ vāci kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brup___u:1652: ātmanaivāyaṃ jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyetīti // BrhUp_4,3.6 //
GV05brup___u:1653: katama ātmeti -- yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdy antarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1654: sa samānaḥ sann ubhau lokāv anusaṃcarati dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva /
GV05brup___u:1655: sa hi svapno bhūtvemaṃ lokam atikrāmati add. mṛtyo rūpāṇi // BrhUp_4,3.7 //
GV05brup___u:1656: sa vā ayaṃ puruṣo jāyamānaḥ śarīram abhisampadyamānaḥ pāpmabhiḥ saṃsṛjyate /
GV05brup___u:1657: sa utkrāman mriyamāṇaḥ pāpmano vijahāti // BrhUp_4,3.8 //
GV05brup___u:1658: tasya vā etasya puruṣasya dve eva sthāne bhavataḥ /
GV05brup___u:1661: tasminsandhye sthāne tiṣṭhan ubhe sthāne paśyatīdaṃ ca paralokasthānaṃ ca /
GV05brup___u:1663: tam ākramam ākramyobhayān pāpmana ānandāṃś ca paśyati /
GV05brup___u:1664: sa yatra prasvapity asya lokasya sarvāvato mātrām apādāya svayaṃ vihatya svayaṃ nirmāya svena bhāsā svena jyotiṣā prasvapiti /
GV05brup___u:1666: na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:1670: na tatra veśāntāḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ sravantyo bhavanti /
GV05brup___u:1675: śukram ādāya punar aiti sthānaṃ hiraṇmayaḥpuruṣa ekahaṃsaḥ // BrhUp_4,3.11 //
GV05brup___u:1676: prāṇena rakṣann avaraṃ kulāyaṃ bahiṣkulāyād amṛtaś caritvā /
GV05brup___u:1677: sa īyate 'mṛto yatrakāmaṃ hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣa ekahaṃsaḥ // BrhUp_4,3.12 //
GV05brup___u:1678: svapnānta uccāvacam īyamāno rūpāṇi devaḥ kurute bahūni /
GV05brup___u:1679: uteva strībhiḥ saha modamāno jakṣad utevāpi bhayāni paśyan // BrhUp_4,3.13 //
GV05brup___u:1680: ārāmam asya paśyanti na taṃ paśyati kaś caneti /
GV05brup___u:1682: durbhiṣajyaṃ hāsmai bhavati yam eṣa na pratipadyate /
GV05brup___u:1683: atho khalv āhur jāgaritadeśa evāsyaisa iti /
GV05brup___u:1684: yāni hy eva jāgrat paśyati tāni supta iti /
GV05brup___u:1688: sa vā eṣa etasmin saṃprasāde ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ pratiyony ādravati svapnāyaiva /
GV05brup___u:1689: sa yat tatra kiñcit paśyaty ananvāgatas tena bhavati /
GV05brup___u:1694: sa vā eṣa etasmin svapne ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ pratiyony ādravati buddhāntāyaiva /
GV05brup___u:1695: sa yat tatra kiñcit paśyaty ananvāgatas tena bhavati /
GV05brup___u:1700: sa vā eṣa etasmin buddhānte ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ pratiyony ādravati svapnāntāyaiva // BrhUp_4,3.17 //
GV05brup___u:1701: tad yathā mahāmatsya ubhe kūle anusaṃcarati pūrvaṃ cāparaṃ ca /
GV05brup___u:1702: evam evāyaṃ puruṣa etāv ubhāv antāv anusaṃcarati svapnāntaṃ ca buddhāntaṃ ca // BrhUp_4,3.18 //
GV05brup___u:1703: tad yathāsminn ākāśe śyeno vā suparṇo vā viparipatya śrāntaḥ saṃhatya pakṣau saṃlayāyaiva dhriyate /
GV05brup___u:1704: evam evāyaṃ puruṣa etasmā antāya dhavati /
GV05brup___u:1705: yatra supto na kaṃ cana kāmaṃ kāmayate na kaṃ cana svapnaṃ paśyati // BrhUp_4,3.19 //
GV05brup___u:1706: tā vā asyaitā hitā nāma nāḍyo yathā keśaḥ sahasradhā bhinnas tāvatāṇimnā tiṣṭhanti /
GV05brup___u:1707: śuklasya nīlasya piṅgalasya haritasya lohitasya pūrṇāḥ /
GV05brup___u:1708: atha yatrainaṃ ghnantīva jinantīva hastīva vicchāyayati gartam iva patati /
GV05brup___u:1709: yad eva jāgrad bhayaṃ paśyati tad atrāvidyayā manyate /
GV05brup___u:1710: atha yatra deva iva rājevāham evedaṃ sarvo 'smīti manyate /
GV05brup___u:1713: tad yathā priyayā striyā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiṃ cana veda nāntaram /
GV05brup___u:1714: evam evāyaṃ puruṣaḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiṃ cana veda nāntaram /
GV05brup___u:1715: tad vā asyaitad āptakāmam ātmakāmam akāmaṃ rūpam śokāntaram // BrhUp_4,3.21 //
GV05brup___u:1716: atra pitāpitā bhavati mātāmātā lokā alokā devā adevā vedā avedāḥ /
GV05brup___u:1717: atra steno 'steno bhavati bhrūṇahābhrūṇahā cāṇḍyālo 'caṇḍyālaḥ paulkaso 'paulkasaḥ śramaṇo 'śramaṇas tāpaso 'tāpasaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1719: tīrṇo hi tadā sarvāñ śokān hṛdayasya bhavati // BrhUp_4,3.22 //
GV05brup___u:1720: yad vai tan na paśyati paśyan vai tan na paśyati /
GV05brup___u:1721: na hi draṣṭur dṛṣṭer viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvān /
GV05brup___u:1722: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yat paśyet // BrhUp_4,3.23 //
GV05brup___u:1723: yad vai tan na jighrati jighran vai tan na jighrati /
GV05brup___u:1724: na hi ghrātur ghrāter viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt /
GV05brup___u:1725: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yaj jighret // BrhUp_4,3.24 //
GV05brup___u:1726: yad vai tan na rasayati rasayan vai tan na rasayati /
GV05brup___u:1727: na hi rasayitū rasayater viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt /
GV05brup___u:1728: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yad rasayet // BrhUp_4,3.25 //
GV05brup___u:1729: yad vai tan na vadati vadan vai tan na vadati /
GV05brup___u:1730: na hi vaktur vakter viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt /
GV05brup___u:1731: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yad vadet // BrhUp_4,3.26 //
GV05brup___u:1732: yad vai tan na śṛṇoti śṛṇvan vai tan na śṛṇoti /
GV05brup___u:1733: na hi śrotuḥ śruter viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt /
GV05brup___u:1734: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yac chṛṇuyāt // BrhUp_4,3.27 //
GV05brup___u:1735: yad vai tan na manute manvāno vai tan na manute /
GV05brup___u:1736: na hi mantur mater viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt /
GV05brup___u:1737: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yan manvīta // BrhUp_4,3.28 //
GV05brup___u:1738: yad vai tan na spṛśati spṛśan vai tan na spṛśati /
GV05brup___u:1739: na hi spraṣṭuḥ spṛṣṭer viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt /
GV05brup___u:1740: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yat spṛśet // BrhUp_4,3.29 //
GV05brup___u:1741: yad vai tan na vijānāti vijānan vai tan na vijānāti /
GV05brup___u:1742: na hi vijñātur vijñāter viparilopo vidyate 'vināśitvāt /
GV05brup___u:1743: na tu tad dvitīyam asti tato 'nyad vibhaktaṃ yad vijānīyāt // BrhUp_4,3.30 //
GV05brup___u:1744_0: yatra vā anyad iva syāt tatrānyo 'nyat paśyed anyo 'nyaj jighred anyo 'nyad rasayed
GV05brup___u:1744_1: anyo 'nyad vaded anyo 'nyac chṛṇuyād anyo 'nyan manvītānyo 'nyat spṛśed anyo 'nyad
GV05brup___u:1753: sa yo manūṣyāṇāṃ rāddhaḥ samṛddho bhavaty anyeṣām adhipatiḥ sarvair mānuṣyakair bhogaiḥ sampannatamaḥ sa manuṣyāṇāṃ parama ānandaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1754: atha ye śataṃ manuṣyāṇām ānandāḥ sa ekaḥ pitṝṇāṃ jitalokānām ānandaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1755: atha ye śataṃ pitṝṇāṃ jitalokānām ānandāḥ sa eko gandharvaloka ānandaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1756: atha ye śataṃ gandharvaloka ānandāḥ sa ekaḥ karmadevānām ānando ye karmaṇā devatvam abhisampadyante /
GV05brup___u:1757: atha ye śataṃ karmadevānām ānandāḥ sa eka ājānadevānām ānandaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1759: atha ye śatam ājānadevānām ānandāḥ sa ekaḥ prajāpatiloka ānandaḥ /
GV05brup___u:1761: atha ye śataṃ prajāpatiloka ānandāḥ sa eko brahmaloka ānandaḥ /

GV05brup___u:2204: kṣatrasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,13.4 //
GV05brup___u:2205: bhūmir antarikṣaṃ dyaur ity aṣṭāv akṣarāṇi /
GV05brup___u:2206: aṣṭākṣaraṃ ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padam /
GV05brup___u:2208: sa yāvad eṣu triṣu lokeṣu tāvad dha jayati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,14.1 //
GV05brup___u:2210: aṣṭākṣaraṃ ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padam /
GV05brup___u:2212: sa yāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā tāvad dha jayati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,14.2 //
GV05brup___u:2214: aṣṭākṣaraṃ ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padam /
GV05brup___u:2216: sa yāvad idaṃ prāṇi tāvad dha jayati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda /
GV05brup___u:2217: athāsyā etad eva turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ parorajā ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brup___u:2219: darśataṃ padam iti dadṛśa iva hy eṣaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2220: parorajā iti sarvam u hy evaiṣa raja upary upari tapati /
GV05brup___u:2221: evaṃ haiva śriyā yaśasā tapati yo 'syā etad evaṃ padaṃ veda // BrhUp_5,14.3 //
GV05brup___u:2222: saiṣā gāyatry etasmiṃs turīye darśate pade parorajasi pratiṣṭhitā /
GV05brup___u:2226: tasmād yad idānīṃ dvau vivadamānāv eyātam aham adarśam aham aśrauṣam iti /
GV05brup___u:2227: ya evaṃ brūyād aham adarśam iti /
GV05brup___u:2229: tad vai tat satyaṃ bale pratiṣṭhitam /
GV05brup___u:2232: tasmād āhur balaṃ satyād ogīya iti /
GV05brup___u:2233: evaṃ v eṣā gāyatry adhyātmaṃ pratiṣṭhitā /
GV05brup___u:2237: tad yad gayāṃs tatre tasmād gāyatrī nāma /
GV05brup___u:2238: sa yām evāmūṃ sāvitrīm anvāhaiṣaiva sā /
GV05brup___u:2239: sa yasmā anvāha tasya prāṇāṃs trāyate // BrhUp_5,14.4 //
GV05brup___u:2240: tāṃ haitām eke sāvitrīm anuṣṭubham anvāhuḥ /
GV05brup___u:2245: yadi ha vā apy evaṃvid bahv iva pratigṛhṇāti na haiva tad gāyatryā ekaṃ cana padaṃ prati // BrhUp_5,14.5 //
GV05brup___u:2246: sa ya imāṃs trīṃl lokān pūrṇān pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etat prathamaṃ padam āpnuyāt /
GV05brup___u:2247: atha yāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā yas tāvat pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etad dvitīyaṃ padam āpnuyāt /
GV05brup___u:2248: atha yāvad idaṃ prāṇi yas tāvat pratigṛhṇīyāt so 'syā etat tṛtīyaṃ padam āpnuyāt /
GV05brup___u:2249: athāsyā etad eva turīyaṃ darśataṃ padaṃ parorajā ya eṣa tapati /
GV05brup___u:2253: gāyatry asy ekapadī dvipadī tripadī catuṣpadi /
GV05brup___u:2256: namas te turīyāya darśatāya padāya parorajase /
GV05brup___u:2258: yaṃ dviṣyād asāv asmai kāmo mā samardhīti vā /
GV05brup___u:2259: na haivāsmai sa kāmaḥ samṛdhyate yasmā evam upatiṣṭhate /
GV05brup___u:2260: aham adaḥ prāpam iti vā // BrhUp_5,14.7 //
GV05brup___u:2261: etad dha vai taj janako vaideho buḍilam āśvatarāśvim uvāca -- yan nu ho tad gāyatrīvid abrūthāḥ /
GV05brup___u:2263: mukhaṃ hy asyāḥ samrāṇ na vidāṃ cakareti hovāca /
GV05brup___u:2265: yadi ha vā api bahv ivāgnāv abhyādadhati sarvam eva tat saṃdahati /
GV05brup___u:2266: evaṃ haivaivaṃvid yady api bahv iva pāpaṃ kurute sarvam eva tat saṃpsāya śuddhaḥ pūto 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ saṃbhavati // BrhUp_5,14.8 //
GV05brup___u:2268: tat tvam pūṣann apāvṛṇu satyadharmāya dṛṣṭaye /
GV05brup___u:2269: pūṣann ekarṣe yama sūrya prājāpatya vyūha raśmīn samūha tejaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2270: yat te rūpaṃ kalyāṇatamam tat te paśyāmi yo 'sāv asau puruṣaḥ so 'ham asmi /
GV05brup___u:2271: vāyur anilam amṛtam athedaṃ bhasmāntaṃ śarīram /
GV05brup___u:2272: oṃ krato smara kṛtaṃ smara krato smara kṛtaṃ smara /
GV05brup___u:2273: agne naya supathā rāye 'smān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān /
GV05brup___u:2274: yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te namauktiṃ vidhema // BrhUp_5,15.1 //
GV05brup___u:2275: yo ha vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda jyeṣṭhaś ca śreṣṭhaś ca svānāṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:2276: prāṇo vai jyeṣṭhaś ca śreṣṭhaś ca /
GV05brup___u:2277: jyeṣṭhaś ca śreṣṭhaś ca svānāṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:2280: yo ha vai vasiṣṭhāṃ veda vasiṣṭhaḥ svānāṃ bhavati /
GV05brup___u:2285: yo ha vai pratiṣṭhāṃ veda pratitiṣṭhati same /
GV05brup___u:2288: cakṣuṣā hi same ca durge ca pratitiṣṭhati /
GV05brup___u:2291: yo ha vai saṃpadaṃ veda saṃ hāsmai padyate yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate /
GV05brup___u:2294: saṃ hāsmai padyate yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate /
GV05brup___u:2296: yo ha vā āyatanaṃ vedāyatanaṃ svānāṃ bhavaty āyatanaṃ janānām /
GV05brup___u:2300: yo ha vai prajātiṃ veda prajāyate ha prajayā paśubhiḥ /
GV05brup___u:2304: te heme prāṇā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānā brahma jagmuḥ /
GV05brup___u:2305: tad dhocuḥ -- ko no vasiṣṭha iti /
GV05brup___u:2306: tad dhovāca -- yasmin va utkrānta idaṃ śarīraṃ pāpiyo manyate sa vo vasiṣṭha iti // BrhUp_6,1.7 //
GV05brup___u:2308: sā saṃvatsaraṃ proṣyāgatyovāca -- katham aśakata mad ṛte jīvitum iti /
GV05brup___u:2309: te hocuḥ -- yathākalā avadanto vācā prāṇantaḥ prāṇena paśyantaś cakṣuṣā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa vidvāṃso manasā prajāyamānā retasaivam ajīviṣmeti /
GV05brup___u:2312: tat saṃvatsaraṃ proṣyāgatyovāca -- katham aśakata mad ṛte jīvitum iti /
GV05brup___u:2313: te hocuḥ -- yathāndhā apaśyantaś cakṣuṣā prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa vidvāṃso manasā prajāyamānā retasaivam ajīviṣmeti /
GV05brup___u:2316: tat saṃvatsaraṃ proṣyāgatyovāca -- katham aśakata mad ṛte jīvitum iti /
GV05brup___u:2317: te hocuḥ -- yathā badhirā aśṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā paśyantaś cakṣuṣā vidvāṃso manasā prajāyamānā retasaivam ajīviṣmeti /
GV05brup___u:2320: tat saṃvatsaraṃ proṣyāgatyovāca -- katham aśakata mad ṛte jīvitum iti /
GV05brup___u:2321: te hocuḥ -- yathā mugdhā avidvāṃso manasā prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā paśyantaś cakṣuṣā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa prajāyamānā retasaivam ajīviṣmeti /
GV05brup___u:2324: tat saṃvatsaraṃ proṣyāgatyovāca -- katham aśakata mad ṛte jīvitum iti /
GV05brup___u:2325: te hocuḥ -- yathā klībā aprajāyamānā retāsā prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā paśyantaś cakṣuṣā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa vidvāṃso manasaivam ajīviṣmeti /
GV05brup___u:2327: atha ha prāṇa utkramiṣyan yathā mahāsuhayaḥ saindhavaḥ paḍvīśaśaṅkhūnt saṃvṛhed evaṃ haivemān prāṇānt saṃvavarha /
GV05brup___u:2329: na vai śakṣyāmas tvad ṛte jīvitum iti /
GV05brup___u:2332: sā ha vāg uvāca -- yad vā ahaṃ vasiṣṭhāsmi tvaṃ tad vasiṣṭho 'sīti /
GV05brup___u:2333: yad vā ahaṃ pratiṣṭhāsmi tvaṃ tat pratiṣṭho 'sīti cakṣuḥ /
GV05brup___u:2334: yad vā ahaṃ saṃpad asmi tvaṃ tat saṃpad asīti śrotram /
GV05brup___u:2335: yad vā aham āyatanam asmi tvaṃ tad āyatanam asīti manaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2336: yad vā ahaṃ prajātir asmi tvaṃ tat prajātir asīti retaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2337: tasyo me kim annaṃ kiṃ vāsa iti /
GV05brup___u:2338: yad idaṃ kiñcā śvabhya ā kṛmibhya ā kīṭapataṅgebhyas tat te 'nnam /
GV05brup___u:2340: na ha vā asyānannaṃ jagdhaṃ bhavati nānannaṃ pratigṛhītaṃ ya evam etad anasyānnaṃ veda /
GV05brup___u:2341: tad vidvāṃsaḥ śrotriyā aśiṣyanta ācāmanty aśitvācāmanti /
GV05brup___u:2342: etam eva tad annam anagnaṃ kurvanto manyante // BrhUp_6,1.14 //
GV05brup___u:2343: śvetaketur vā āruṇeyaḥ pancālānāṃ pariṣadam ājagāma /
GV05brup___u:2349: vettha yathemāḥ prajāḥ prayatyo vipratipadyantā3 iti /
GV05brup___u:2351: vettho yathemaṃ lokaṃ punar āpadyantā3 iti /
GV05brup___u:2353: vettho yathāsau loka evaṃ bahubhiḥ punaḥ punaḥ prayadbhir na saṃpūryatā3 iti /
GV05brup___u:2355: vettho yatithyām āhutyāṃ hutāyām āpaḥ puruṣavāco bhūtvā samutthāya vadantī3 iti /
GV05brup___u:2357: vettho devayānasya vā pathaḥ pratipadaṃ pitṛyāṇasya vā /
GV05brup___u:2358: yat kṛtvā devayānaṃ vā panthānaṃ pratipadyante pitṛyāṇaṃ vā /
GV05brup___u:2359: api hi na ṛṣer vacaḥ śrutaṃ --
GV05brup___u:2360: dve sṛtī aśṛṇavaṃ pitṝṇām ahaṃ devānām uta martyānām /
GV05brup___u:2361: tābhyām idaṃ viśvam ejat sameti yad antarā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ceti /
GV05brup___u:2362: nāham ata ekaṃ cana vedeti hovāca // BrhUp_6,2.2 //
GV05brup___u:2366: taṃ hovāca -- iti vāva kila no bhavān purānuśiṣṭān avoca iti /
GV05brup___u:2371: ima iti ha pratīkāny udājahāra // BrhUp_6,2.3 //
GV05brup___u:2372: sa hovāca -- tathā nas tvaṃ tata jānīthā yathā yad ahaṃ kiṃca veda sarvam ahaṃ tat tubham avocam /
GV05brup___u:2376: sa ājagāma gautamo yatra pravāhaṇasya jaivaler āsa /
GV05brup___u:2379: taṃ hovāca -- varaṃ bhagavate gautamāya dadma iti // BrhUp_6,2.4 //
GV05brup___u:2380: sa hovāca -- pratijñato ma eṣa varaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2381: yāṃ tu kumārasyānte vācam abhāṣathās tāṃ me brūhīti // BrhUp_6,2.5 //
GV05brup___u:2382: sa hovāca -- daiveṣu vai gautama tad vareṣu /
GV05brup___u:2384: sa hovāca -- vijñāyate hāstihiraṇyasyāpāttaṃ goaśvānāṃ dāsīnāṃ pravārāṇāṃ paridhānasya /
GV05brup___u:2385: mā no bhavān bahor anantasyāparyantasyābhyavadānyo bhūd iti /
GV05brup___u:2390: sa hovāca -- tathā nas tvam gautama māparādhās tava ca pitāmahāḥ /
GV05brup___u:2391: yatheyaṃ vidyetaḥ pūrvaṃ na kasmiṃś cana brāhmana uvāsa /
GV05brup___u:2393: ko hi tvaivaṃ bruvantam arhati pratyākhyātum iti // BrhUp_6,2.8 //
GV05brup___u:2400: tasminn etasminn agnau devāḥ śraddhāṃ juhvati /
GV05brup___u:2401: tasyā āhutyai somo rājā saṃbhavati // BrhUp_6,2.9 //
GV05brup___u:2408: tasminn etasminn agnau devāḥ somaṃ rājānaṃ juhvati /
GV05brup___u:2416: tasminn etasminn agnau devā vṛṣṭiṃ juhvati /
GV05brup___u:2424: tasminn etasminn agnau devā annaṃ juhvati /
GV05brup___u:2432: tasminn etasminn agnau devā reto juhvati /
GV05brup___u:2443: tasminn etasminn agnau devāḥ puruṣaṃ juhvati /
GV05brup___u:2444: tasyā āhutyai puruṣo bhāsvaravarṇaḥ saṃbhavati // BrhUp_6,2.14 //
GV05brup___u:2445: te ya evam etad vidur ye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyam upāsate te 'rcir abhisaṃbhavanti /
GV05brup___u:2448: āpūryamāṇapakṣād yān ṣaṇ māsān udaṅṅ āditya eti /
GV05brup___u:2452: tān vaidyutān puruṣo mānasa etya brahmalokān gamayati /
GV05brup___u:2453: te teṣu brahmalokeṣu parāḥ parāvato vasanti /
GV05brup___u:2455: atha ye yajñena dānena tapasā lokāñ jayanti te dhūmam abhisaṃbhavanti /
GV05brup___u:2458: apakṣīyamāṇapakṣād yān ṣaṇ māsān dakṣiṇāditya eti /
GV05brup___u:2462: tāṃs tatra devā yathā somaṃ rājānam āpyāyasvāpakṣīyasvety evam enāṃs tatra bhakṣayanti /
GV05brup___u:2463: teṣāṃ yadā tat paryavaity athemam evākāśam abhiniṣpadyante /
GV05brup___u:2468: te punaḥ puruṣāgnau hūyante tato yoṣāgnau jāyante /
GV05brup___u:2470: atha ya etau panthānau na vidus te kīṭāḥ pataṅgā yad idaṃ dandaśūkam // BrhUp_6,2.16 //
GV05brup___u:2471_0: sa yaḥ kāmayeta -- mahat prāpnuyām ity udagayana āpūryamāṇapakṣasya puṇyāhe dvādaśāham
GV05brup___u:2471_1: upasadvratī bhūtvaudumbare kaṃse camase vā sarvauṣadhaṃ phalānīti saṃbhṛtya parisamuhya
GV05brup___u:2471_2: parilipyāgnim upasamādhāya paristīryāvṛtājyaṃ saṃskṛtya puṃsā nakṣatreṇa manthaṃ saṃnīya juhoti --
GV05brup___u:2472: yāvanto devās tvayi jātavedas tiryañco ghnanti puruṣasya kāmān /
GV05brup___u:2473: tebhyo 'haṃ bhāgadheyaṃ juhomi te mā tṛptāḥ sarvaiḥ kāmais tarpayantu svāhā /
GV05brup___u:2475: tāṃ tvā ghṛtasya dhārayā yaje saṃrādhanīm ahaṃ svāhā // BrhUp_6,3.1 //
GV05brup___u:2476: jyeṣṭhāya svāhā śreṣṭhāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2477: prāṇāya svāhā vasiṣṭhāyai svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2478: vāce svāhā pratiṣṭhāyai svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2479: cakṣuṣe svāhā saṃpade svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2480: śrotrāya svāhāyatanāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2481: manase svāhā prajātyai svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2482: retase svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati // BrhUp_6,3.2 //
GV05brup___u:2483: agnaye svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2484: somāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2485: bhūḥ svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2486: bhuvaḥ svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2487: svaḥ svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2488: bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2489: brahmaṇe svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2490: kṣatrāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2491: bhūtāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2492: bhaviṣyate svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2493: viśvāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2494: sarvāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati /
GV05brup___u:2495: prajāpataye svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃsravam avanayati // BrhUp_6,3.3 //
GV05brup___u:2514: athainam udyacchaty āmaṃsy āmaṃ hi te mahi /
GV05brup___u:2516: sa māṃ rājeśano 'dhipatiṃ karotv iti // BrhUp_6,3.5 //
GV05brup___u:2519: madhu vātā ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2523: madhu naktam utoṣaso madhumat pārthivaṃ rajaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2527: madhumān no vanaspatir madhumāṃ astu sūryaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2531: sarvāś ca madhumatīr aham evedaṃ sarvaṃ bhūyāsaṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ svāheti antata ācamya pāṇī prakṣālya jaghanenāgniṃ prākśirāḥ saṃviśati /
GV05brup___u:2535: yathetam etya jaghanenāgnim āsīno vaṃśaṃ japati // BrhUp_6,3.6 //
GV05brup___u:2536: taṃ haitam uddālaka āruṇir vājasaneyāya yājñavalkyāyāntevāsina uktvovāca -- api ya enaṃ śuṣke sthāṇau niṣiñcej jāyerañ chākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānīti // BrhUp_6,3.7 //
GV05brup___u:2537: etam u haiva vājasaneyo yājnavalkyo madhukāya paiṅgyāyāntevāsina uktvovāca -- api ya enaṃ śuṣke sthāṇau niṣiñcej jāyerañ chākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānīti // BrhUp_6,3.8 //
GV05brup___u:2538: etam u haiva madhukaḥ paiṅgyaś cūlāya bhāgavittaye 'ntevāsina uktvovāca -- api ya enaṃ śuṣke sthāṇau niṣiñcej jāyerañ chākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānīti // BrhUp_6,3.9 //
GV05brup___u:2539: etam u haiva cūlo bhāgavittir jānakaya āyaḥsthūṇāyāntevāsina uktvovāca -- api ya enaṃ śuṣke sthāṇau niṣiñcej jāyerañ chākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānīti // BrhUp_6,3.10 //
GV05brup___u:2540: etam u haiva jānakir āyasthūṇaḥ satyakāmāya jābālāyāntevāsina uktvovāca -- api ya enaṃ śuṣke sthāṇau niṣiñcej jāyerañ chākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānīti // BrhUp_6,3.11 //
GV05brup___u:2541: etam u haiva satyakāmo jābālo 'ntevāsibhya uktvova -- acāpi ya enaṃ śuṣke sthāṇau niṣiñcej jāyerañ chākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānīti /
GV05brup___u:2542: tam etaṃ nāputrāya vānantevāsine vā brūyāt // BrhUp_6,3.12 //
GV05brup___u:2544: audumbaraḥ sruva audumbaraś camasa audumbara idhma audumbaryā upamanthanyau /
GV05brup___u:2546: vrīhiyavās tilamāṣā aṇupriyaṃgavo godhūmāś ca masūrāś ca khalvāś ca khalakulāś ca /
GV05brup___u:2547: tān piṣṭān dadhani madhuni ghṛta upasiñcati /
GV05brup___u:2556: sa ha prajāpatir īkṣāṃ cakre -- hantāsmai pratiṣṭhāṃ kalpayānīti sa striyaṃ sasṛje /
GV05brup___u:2559: sa etaṃ prāñcaṃ grāvāṇam ātmana eva samudapārayat /
GV05brup___u:2565: sa yāvān ha vai vājapeyena yajamanasya loko bhavati tāvān asya loko bhavati /
GV05brup___u:2566: ya evaṃ vidvān adhopahāsaṃ caraty āsāṃ strīṇāṃ sukṛtaṃ vṛṅkte /
GV05brup___u:2567: atha ya idam avidvān adhopahāsaṃ caraty āsya striyaḥ sukṛtaṃ vṛñjate // BrhUp_6,4.3 //
GV05brup___u:2568: etad dha sma vai tad vidvān uddālaka ārunir āha /
GV05brup___u:2569: etad dha sma vai tad vidvān nāko maudgalya āha /
GV05brup___u:2570: etad dha sma vai tad vidvān kumārahārita āha -- bahavo maryā brāhmanāyanā nirindriyā visukṛto 'smāl lokāt prayanti ya idam avidvāṃso 'dhopahāsaṃ carantīti /
GV05brup___u:2571: bahu vā idaṃ suptasya vā jāgrato vā retaḥ skandati // BrhUp_6,4.4 //
GV05brup___u:2572: tad abhimṛśed anu vā mantrayeta -- yan me 'dya retaḥ pṛthivīm askāntsīd yad oṣadhīr apy asarad yad apaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2574: punar mām aitu indriyaṃ punas tejaḥ punar bhagaḥ /
GV05brup___u:2576: ity anāmikāṅguṣṭhābhyām ādāyāntareṇa stanau vā bhruvau vā nimṛjyāt // BrhUp_6,4.5 //
GV05brup___u:2577: atha yady udaka ātmānaṃ paśyet tad abhimantrayeta -- mayi teja indriyaṃ yaśo draviṇaṃ sukṛtam iti /
GV05brup___u:2578: śrīr ha vā eṣā strīṇāṃ yan malodvāsāḥ /
GV05brup___u:2580: sā ced asmai na dadyāt kāmam enām avakriṇīyāt /
GV05brup___u:2581: sā ced asmai naiva dadyāt kāmam enāṃ yaṣṭyā vā pāṇinā vopahatyātikrāmet /
GV05brup___u:2582: indriyena te yaśasā yaśa ādada iti /
GV05brup___u:2584: sā ced asmai dadyād indriyeṇa te yaśasā yaśa ādadhāmīti /
GV05brup___u:2586: sa yām icchet -- kāmayeta meti tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāyopastham asyā abhimṛśya japet --
GV05brup___u:2588: sa tvam aṅgakaṣāyo 'si digdhaviddhām iva mādayemām amūṃ mayīti // BrhUp_6,4.9 //
GV05brup___u:2589: atha yām icchen na garbhaṃ dadhīteti tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāyābhiprāṇyāpānyāt /
GV05brup___u:2590: indriyeṇa te retasā reta ādada iti /
GV05brup___u:2592: atha yām icched dadhīteti tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāyāpānyābhiprāṇyāt /
GV05brup___u:2595: atha yasya jāyāyai jāraḥ syāt taṃ ced dviṣyād āmapātre 'gnim upasamādhāya pratilomaṃ śarabarhiḥ stīrtvā tasminn etāḥ śarabhṛṣṭīḥ pratilomāḥ sarpiṣāktā juhuyāt /
GV05brup___u:2604: sa vā eṣa nirindriyo visukṛto 'smāl lokād praiti yam evaṃvid brāhmaṇaḥ śapati /
GV05brup___u:2606: uta hy evaṃvit paro bhavati // BrhUp_6,4.12 //
GV05brup___u:2607: atha yasya jāyām ārtavaṃ vindet tryahaṃ kaṃse na pibet /
GV05brup___u:2611: sa ya icchet -- putro me śuklo jāyeta vedam anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti kṣīraudanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām /
GV05brup___u:2613: atha ya icchet -- putro me kapilaḥ piṅgalo jāyeta dvau vedāv anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti dadhyodanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām /
GV05brup___u:2615: atha ya icchet -- putro me śyāmo lohitākṣo jāyeta trīn vedān anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti udaudanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām /
GV05brup___u:2617: atha ya icched -- duhitā me paṇḍitā jāyeta sarvam āyur iyād iti tilaudanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām /
GV05brup___u:2619: atha ya icchet -- putro me paṇḍito vigītaḥ samitiṃgamaḥ śuśrūṣitāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣitā jāyeta sarvān vedān anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti māṃsaudanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām /
GV05brup___u:2622: athābhiprātar eva sthālīpākāvṛtājyaṃ ceṣṭitvā sthālīpākasyopaghātaṃ juhoty agnaye svāhānumataye svāhā devāya savitre satyaprasavāya svāheti /
GV05brup___u:2625: prakṣālya pāṇī udapātraṃ pūrayitvā tenaināṃ trir abhyukṣati --
GV05brup___u:2628: athainām abhipadyate -- amo 'ham asmi sā tvam /
GV05brup___u:2632: tāv ehi saṃrabhāvahai saha reto dadhāvahai /
GV05brup___u:2634: athāsyā ūrū vihāpayati -- vijihīthāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī iti /
GV05brup___u:2635: tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāya trir enām anulomām anumārṣṭi --
GV05brup___u:2636: viṣṇur yoniṃ kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu /
GV05brup___u:2637: ā siñcatu prajāpatir dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te /
GV05brup___u:2638: garbhaṃ dhehi sinīvāli garbhaṃ dhehi pṛthuṣṭuke /
GV05brup___u:2639: garbhaṃ te aśvinau devāv ādhattāṃ puṣkarasrajau // BrhUp_6,4.21 //
GV05brup___u:2641: taṃ te garbhaṃ havāmahe daśame māsi sūtaye /
GV05brup___u:2642: yathāgnigarbhā pṛthivī yathā dyaur aindreṇa garbhiṇī /
GV05brup___u:2643: vāyur diśāṃ yathā garbha evaṃ garbhaṃ dadhāmi te 'sāv iti // BrhUp_6,4.22 //
GV05brup___u:2646: evā te garbha ejatu sahāvaitu jarāyuṇā /
GV05brup___u:2648: tam indra nirjahi garbheṇa sāvarāṃ saheti // BrhUp_6,4.23 //
GV05brup___u:2649: jāte 'gnim upasamādhāyāṅka ādhāya kaṃse pṛṣadājyaṃ saṃnīya pṛṣadājyasyopaghātaṃ juhoti --
GV05brup___u:2651: asyopasandyāṃ mā chaitsīt prajayā ca paśubhiś ca svāhā /
GV05brup___u:2652: mayi prāṇāṃs tvayi manasā juhomi svāhā /
GV05brup___u:2653: yat karmaṇātyarīricam yad vā nyūnam ihākaram /
GV05brup___u:2654: agniṣṭat sviṣṭakṛd vidvān sviṣṭaṃ suhutaṃ karotu naḥ svāheti // BrhUp_6,4.24 //
GV05brup___u:2655: athāsya dakṣiṇaṃ karṇam abhinidhāya vāg vāg iti triḥ /
GV05brup___u:2656: atha dadhi madhu ghṛtaṃ saṃnīyānantarhitena jātarūpeṇa prāśayati /
GV05brup___u:2657: bhūs te dadhāmi bhuvas te dadhāmi svas te dadhāmi bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ sarvaṃ tvayi dadhāmīti // BrhUp_6,4.25 //
GV05brup___u:2659: tad asyaitad guhyam eva nāma bhavati // BrhUp_6,4.26 //
GV05brup___u:2660: athainaṃ mātre pradāya stanaṃ prayacchati -- yas te stanaḥ śaśayo yo mayobhūr yo ratnadhā vasuvid yaḥ sudatraḥ /
GV05brup___u:2661: yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi sarasvati tam iha dhātave kar iti // BrhUp_6,4.27 //
GV05brup___u:2662: athāsya mātaram abhimantrayate -- ilāsi maitrāvaruṇī vīre vīram ajījanat /
GV05brup___u:2663: sā tvaṃ vīravatī bhava yāsmān vīravato 'karad iti /
GV05brup___u:2664: taṃ vā etam āhuḥ -- atipitā batābhūḥ /
GV05brup___u:2666: paramāṃ bata kāṣṭhāṃ prāpa śriyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena /
GV05brup___u:2667: ya evaṃvido brāhmaṇasya putro jāyata iti // BrhUp_6,4.28 //
GV05brup___u:2722: ādityānīmāni śuklāni yajūṃṣi vājasaneyena yājñavalkyenākhyayante // BrhUp_6,5.3 //
